answer:
I'm here to help! This is a list of commands that you can use.
!challenge
 Will give you a challenge to complete
 That is all for now.
:smile:

Well, hello there! :wave:
My name is Hinoa and I am your guild maiden!
If you would like to add a role to your profile, you can use any of the reactions below and I will add it to your hunter rank. :slight_smile:
:dog: adds **MH Rise**
:earth_americas: adds **MH World**
:french_bread: adds **MH 4**
:fish: adds **MH 3**
Hunt the monster within 10 minutes (no capture)
Complete a rampage the monster participates in
Hunt the monster using the element(s) it resists
Hunt the monster using one of it's weapons
Hunt the monster without using healing items
Hunt the monster without sharpening your weapon
Hunt the monster without using silkbind moves
Hunt the monster without using mountable monsters
Hunt the monster using [Sword and Shield]
Aim for a small or large crown
Take a picture of the monster
Hunt the monster without wearing any armour
Hunt a high rank monster wearing low rank armour
Hunt the monster without bringing a hunting buddy
